lines: 1. On our way rejoicing Gladly let us go; Conquer'd hath our Leader Vanquish'd is the foe. Christ without, our safety; Christ within, our joy Who, if we be faithful, Can our hope destroy?
Refrain : On our way rejoicing As we forward move Hearken to our praises, O blest God of love!
2. Unto God the Father Joyful songs we sing, Unto God the Saviour Thankful hearts we bring, Unto God the Spirit bow we and adore, On our way rejoicing Now and evermore.
